Andy muddles mint and ginger to recreate a G&T inspired by his travels to Spain.By BOMBAY SAPPHIRE® GINApril 3, 20215.0(4)Read ReviewsTriangleEmailPinterestPrintTed + Chelsea CavanaughEmailPinterestPrintEmailPinterestPrintIngredients1½oz. Bombay Sapphire8fresh mint leaves, slapped, plus a sprig for garnish3oz. premium tonic water1½-inch piece ginger½tsp. honeyIcePreparationStep 1Combine the mint leaves, lemon wedge, ginger, and honey in a cocktail shaker. Muddle the ingredients just until they begin to release the juices from the lemon and mixture smells fragrant. Step 2Add Bombay Sapphire Gin, fill the cocktail shaker with ice and shake vigorously for 30 seconds until the shaker is very cold and frosty.Step 3Strain the mixture through a fine-mesh sieve into a balloon glass, and top with tonic water.Step 4Garnish with more mint and lemon peel.Click to Shop Bombay Sapphire NowBE BRILLIANT AND INSPIRED.
